name: Klein Tools 60604 Work Gloves, Premium Cowhide Leather Gloves, Abrasion-Resistant Split Leather Palm Patch, Large
short_description: Cowhide Leather
Imported
SOFT COWHIDE LEATHER: Soft top grain cowhide leather makes these gloves flexible and soft, offering maximum comfort for all day usage
GUNN CUT WORK GLOVES: Gunn Cut design offers higher dexterity by minimizing bulk of leather around the middle and ring fingers making this a comfortable and flexible glove
ABRASION-RESISTANT: Split leather palm patch offers increased durability and abrasion resistance in high wear areas, increasing the lifespan of these gloves
TAN COLOR: Natural light tan leather color gives these gloves an authentic look and feel
SECURE FIT: Designed with a flexible thermoplastic rubber (TPR) pull tab for optimal grip and control
SLIP-ON STYLE: Slip-on style allows quick and effortless on and off making these gloves perfect for quick and efficient hand protection
HEAVY-DUTY GLOVES: Excellent hand protection makes these gloves ideal for rougher jobs that require higher hand protection
product_description: Klein Tools Cowhide Leather Work Gloves are made to last with the high abrasion resistant top grain cowhide leather construction. The gunn cut design offers higher dexterity by minimizing excess leather around fingers, making these gloves flexible. Constructed with a dual layer of split leather on the palm offers a high abrasion resistant reinforcement, increasing the lifespan of these gloves. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

short_description: Leather
Made in the USA and Imported

✅ SUPERIOR COMFORT AND FLEXIBILITY: Designed with a breathable cotton back to keep your hands cool during extended wear. These gloves offer exceptional comfort, allowing you to perform tasks for longer hours without discomfort. Whether you’re working indoors or outdoors, these gloves provide a great balance of flexibility and protection for your hands.

✅ HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION FOR TOUGH JOBS: Built to withstand harsh work environments, these gloves are ideal for construction, manual labor, and heavy-duty tasks. The premium cowhide leather palm provides a tough barrier against rough materials and surfaces, ensuring reliable protection while handling tools, equipment, or materials.

✅ ENHANCED SAFETY FEATURES: Equipped with a rubberized safety cuff, these gloves offer extra protection by preventing debris from entering the gloves during your work. Whether you're tackling home improvement projects or working on a job site, you can rely on these gloves to last through demanding conditions without compromising on comfort or performance.
